title: 100-Player Twitch Chat Party Pack
notes: Requires a constant Internet connection and Twitch account in order to play. No updates since February, 2023. Currently in Early Access with no player base whatsoever.

title: 8BitMMO
notes: Initially released in Early Access on 13 December, 2013. Little - no player base whatsoever.

title: 8Realms
notes: Shut down during Closed Beta.

title: Ace of Spades
notes: Originally planned to shut down on 3 July, 2018, this was postponed after fan outcry. Build & Shoot is a fan-site hosting various iterations of the original game. OpenSpades is a clone of Ace of Spaces 0.75.

title: Ace Online/AirRivals
notes: Afflicted with various server transfers and closures over its lifetime and known by various other names including 'Space Cowboy Online' and 'Flysis'

title: AdventureQuest
notes: Requires a constant Internet connection. Previously an Adobe Flash browser game, is now playable via publisher's in-house game launcher.

title: AdventureQuest 3D
notes: Initially released in Early Access on 19 October, 2016. Low player base.

title: AdventureQuest Worlds
notes: Previously an Adobe Flash browser game, is now playable via publisher's in-house game launcher. Progress will be transferred to remake when released.

title: Aero Tales Online: The World
notes: PC version currently in Early Access with a very low player base, whilst the mobile release boasts a player base of tens of thousands.

title: Aether Story
notes: Currently only available on itch.io in Alpha. Will be released on Steam Early Access sometime soon. No updates since April, 2023.

title: Age of Armor
notes: Released in Closed Beta in mid - late, 2007 in China. Information on the game is scant.

title: Age of Conan: Unchained
notes: Very low player base.

title: Age of Empires Online
notes: Project Celeste includes fully realised content cut from the original game and new, original content by the fan developers.

title: Aion
notes: As of April 2024, both the actual game and the Beyond Aion private server have very few players.

title: Albion Online
notes: Active player base.

title: Aliens vs Predator 2
notes: Fan resurrection includes modern PC enhancements.

title: America's Army: Proving Grounds
notes: Initially released in Open Beta on 29 August, 2013. Private servers, mission editor, and offline features continue to function.

title: Anarchy Online
notes: No player base whatsoever.

title: Anno 2070
notes: Originally planned to shut down on 1 September, 2022, Ubisoft Mainz updated the game to a 64-bit build on 7 September, 2022, maintaining multiplayer support. Very low player base.

title: Anthem
notes: BioWare announced all future development of the game had ceased in February, 2021.

title: APB Reloaded
notes: Official 6 December, 2011 relaunch of APB: All Points Bulletin, which shut down in late 2010. XB1 services ended in January, 2024, whilst the PS4 services ended on 2 August, 2024. Relatively low player base.

title: Arcane Waters
notes: Currently in Early Access with no player base whatsoever.

title: ArcheAge
notes: NA and EU servers shut down on 27 June, 2024.

title: ArchLord
notes: Fan resurrection includes new, original content.

title: Armored Warfare
notes: Low player base.

title: Ascend: Reborn
notes: Official 1 December, 2022 relaunch of Ascend: Hand of Kul, which shut down on 20 June, 2016. Very little player base.

title: Asheron's Call
notes: Fan resurrection is open-source.

title: Asheron's Call 2: Fallen Kings
notes: Killed off twice. Originally killed off in December, 2005, officially resurrected in 2013. Fan revival/rebuild project is currently in development

title: Asta Online
notes: Killed off twice. Originally killed off on 4 October, 2016, officially resurrected on 26 April, 2017. Information on the game is scant.

title: Babylon's Fall
notes: Generally received poor reviews, reached only a single concurrent player as of 7 May, 2022 (https://videogameschronicle.com/news/babylons-fall-dropped-to-just-one-concurrent-player-on-pc/).

title: Back 4 Blood
notes: Active player base.

title: Battle Tanks: Legends of World War II
notes: PC release has a very low player base, whilst the mobile release boasts a player base of around a million.

title: Battleborn
notes: Lead developer Cliff Bleszinski has mentioned on Twitter over the past several years of potentially bringing the game back in some capacity.

title: Battlefield 1
notes: Receiving less attention because of its sequels.

title: Battlefield 1942
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy.

title: Battlefield 1943
notes: Removed from storefronts on 28 April, 2023.

title: Battlefield 2
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy. Fan resurrections are periodically taken down by EA, so the links may be out of date.

title: Battlefield 2042
notes: Active player base.

title: Battlefield 2142
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy. Fan resurrections are periodically taken down by EA, so the links may be out of date. Can be played offline with various mods.

title: Battlefield 3
notes: Receiving less attention because of its sequels.

title: Battlefield 4
notes: Receiving less attention because of its sequels.

title: Battlefield Hardline
notes: Receiving less attention because of its sequels.

title: Battlefield Heroes
notes: Rising Hub is a full fan resurrection, Battlefield Heroes 42 is a fan port of the game's maps into Battlefield 1942.

title: Battlefield Online
notes: Korean remake of Battlefield 2 in the Refractor 2 engine.

title: Battlefield Play4Free
notes: Battlefield 2: Play for Free is a fan port of the game's maps into Battlefield 2.

title: Battlefield V
notes: Stopped receiving updates in mid-2020.

title: Battlefield Vietnam
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy. Resurrected with OpenSpy.

title: Battlefield: Bad Company
notes: Removed from storefronts on 28 April, 2023.

title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2
notes: Removed from storefronts on 28 April, 2023.

title: Beyond Protocol
notes: Source code was released to the public circa the shut down.

title: BigFest
notes: Information on the game is scant.

title: Bleeding Edge
notes: Development team ended updates 10 months after release on 28 January, 2021 (https://twitter.com/BleedingEdgeNT/status/1354836826322776066). No player base.

title: BrawlQuest
notes: No player base whatsoever.

title: BRINK
notes: Dedicated servers and local hosting are available to run on PC.

title: Burnout 3: Takedown
notes: Local play is still available.

title: Burnout Crash!
notes: Offline content is still available.

title: Burnout Paradise
notes: No longer purchasable digitally. Local play is still available.

title: Burnout Revenge
notes: Offline multiplayer is still available.

title: Cartoon Network Universe: FusionFall
notes: FusionFall Universe fan resurrections were forced to shut down in April, 2020 because of a DMCA from Cartoon Network. OpenFusion is an open-source, reverse-engineered server.

title: Century: Age of Ashes
notes: PC release has a low player base.

title: Champions Online
notes: Low player base. An Xbox 360 version was in development but was cancelled in March, 2010.

title: Chivalry 2
notes: Has an 'Offline Practice Mode' that cannot actually be played offline.

title: Chivalry: Medieval Warfare
notes: Though the official servers have shut down, unofficial/private servers and offline play with AI remain available.

title: City of Heroes
notes: Source code was released in April, 2019, allowing anyone to run their own private servers. On 4 January, 2024, NCSoft officially granted the Homecoming developers an official license to host the game.

title: City of Steam: Arkadia
notes: The developers claim the game is 'resting' and not 'retired', hinting at a possible return of the game at some point in the future.

title: Clone Wars Adventures
notes: Fan resurrection currently in Closed Alpha with a single-player demo that has not been updated since 28 November, 2018.

title: Club Penguin
notes: Shut down in favour of its (initially) mobile-exclusive sequel/sucessor, Club Penguin Island (which also ended up shutting down soon after). Fan resurrections are periodically taken down by Disney, so the links may be out of date.

title: Club Penguin Island
notes: An offline mode was introduced on 5 November, 2018 and can still be played, but with minimal features.

title: Command & Conquer (2013)
notes: Shut down in Closed Alpha. Originally planned to release in Closed Beta on 25 November, 2013 and fully release on 24 February, 2014.

title: Command & Conquer: Renegade
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy.

title: Command & Conquer: Sole Survivor
notes: An offline deathmatch mode can be played with bots. Fan resurrection in a 'controlled alpha test' since January, 2022. No updates since January, 2024.

title: Command and Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy.

title: Command and Conquer: Generals
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy.

title: Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy.

notes: No player base whatsoever.

title: Corleone Online
notes: No player base whatsoever.

notes: Announcement was made 19 December, 2022, with all in-app purchaches being turned off.

title: Crash Team Rumble
notes: Received its final content update on 4 March, 2024.

title: Creativerse
notes: Very low player base. Initially released in Early Access in August, 2014.

title: Crossout
notes: Active player base.

title: Crossout Mobile
notes: Active player base.

title: Crowfall

title: Crysis
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy. Delisted from storefronts in favour of remaster, which lacks multiplayer.

title: Crysis 2
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy. Delisted from storefronts in favour of remaster, which lacks multiplayer.

title: Crysis 3
notes: Online services shut down with GameSpy. Delisted from storefronts in favour of remaster, which lacks multiplayer.

title: Crysis Wars
notes: Multiplayer portion of Crysis Warhead. Online services shut down with GameSpy.

title: Cyber Hunter
notes: PC release has a low player base, whilst the mobile version boasts a player base in the millions.

title: Dark Eden
notes: Official servers have low/nonexistent player base; information on the game is scant and contradictory at best. Originally shut down at the end of 2013, but was relaunched on Steam on 28 November, 2016. Fans have created custom private servers.

title: Dark Eden Origin
notes: Relaunch of Dark Eden. Official servers have low/nonexistent player base; information on the game is scant and contradictory at best.

title: Dark Souls - Prepare to Die Edition
notes: The online services for the Steamworks version were shut down due to ongoing server exploits. The GFWL version remains operable and severable third-party solutions remain viable as alternatives. Delisted from storefronts in favour of remaster.

title: Dark Souls II
notes: PC servers are still online in 2024

title: Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: Open source fan server supports DS2 (SOTFS) and DS3.

title: Dark Souls III
notes: Online features were temporarily unavailable from January 23, 2022 to August 25, 2022 to investigate security vulnerabilities. Open source fan server supports DS2 (SOTFS) and DS3.

title: Darkfall Unholy Wars
notes: Official website appears to have been hacked, with a message falsely claiming the game has been resurrected.

title: Darkspore
notes: Fan resurrection currently a WIP, but hasn't been updated since June, 2022.

title: DayZ
notes: Dedicated servers and self-hosting are available.

title: DC Universe Online
notes: PC version has a relatively low player base. PS3 version shut down on 31 January, 2018, with players able to transfer progress to the PS4 version.

title: Deadside
notes: Currently in Early Access with a low player base.

notes: Receiving less attention because of its sequel.

title: The Lord of the Rings Online
The Matrix Awakens
notes: Similar case to P.T.; whilst the game has been delisted, those who have downloaded it in the past are still able to redownload it. Over time this exclusivity will either end when the game is made available again or the accounts that have access to this game are no longer active. The city environment is available to download on PC via https://pcgamer.com/unreal-engine-5-city-sample-matrix/

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege

title: Tower Unite
notes: Game relies on dedicated servers for some of the games functions, while it would still be partially playable the game would be crippled without those. The main 'hub' plaza would be down, and unoffical hosted ones would not function right as most parts of it would not work (such as the casino). Devs however have stated they plan to release dedicated server software to the public should a shutdown occur.
